meanings.definition: A dull, boring, or unattractive person.
meanings.sent1: The party was full of gonks who just sat in the corner.
meanings.sent2: She always avoided talking to the gonk in her class.
meanings.sent3: The play had a character who was meant to be a gonk, but ended up stealing the show.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were filled with gonks, lost in their own worlds.
meanings.sent5: The movie villain was portrayed as a gonk, with no redeeming qualities.

meanings.sent1: After a long day, he decided to gonk on the couch.
meanings.sent2: She likes to gonk for a few minutes after lunch.
meanings.sent3: The cat gonked peacefully in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The tired hiker finally found a spot to gonk under a tree.
meanings.sent5: The baby will gonk in the car on the way home.

meanings.definition: A sound made by a machine or engine.
meanings.sent1: The old car made a loud gonk when starting up.
meanings.sent2: The factory was filled with the constant gonk of machinery.
meanings.sent3: The robot's gonk was so loud, it woke up the whole house.
meanings.sent4: The mysterious spaceship emitted a strange gonk as it landed.
meanings.sent5: The broken clock on the wall made a faint gonk every hour.
